item.description:
Join us for a Sacred Journey through the Chakras as we explore many aspects of Sustainable, Conscious Living! 12noon - midnight

Sliding Scale $20-$80

We will start at our ROOT Chakra with Earth Based Permaculture Basics, Sustainable Skill Share & Bazaar, Local Arts & Crafts, Hands-on Workshops and move up to the Navel & Solar Plexus with Yoga, Hooping, Raw Food Demos, Tantra & Sacred Sexuality. At the heart half way through our journey we will gather for a community cacao ceremony to bring greater compassion for ourselves & one another. We will spend the afternoon relaxing with SuperFood Infused Cacao Body Treatments, Healing Body Work & Detox Elixirs, Tonics & Brews available from the Alchemy Cafe. After Dinner we will sink into a slumber with Healing Sounds to open our throat chakras and experience a community gonging to re-align & re-activate our energy fields and open our third eye. Finally we move into an ultimate evening of bliss with Drumming & Ecstatic Trance Dance awakening our full orgasmic potential and instinctual knowledge of what is possible in commUNITY!

 

ITINERY:

12-4pm Inform – mini workshop discussions & demos (permaculture, sustainable living & community), social networking & handmade local products

 

4-8pm  Embody – tai chi, tribal yoga, qi gong, hula hooping, circus performance, ionic footbath, infrared sauna, cacao body treatments, massage, reiki, energy healing, organic café & juice bar open, shamanic cacao ceremony


8-12pm  Embrace – kirtan concert, sound healing, gonging, drumming, trance dance

 

 SPECIAL PERFORMANCES BY KIELA CABARET (HOW TO GET INTO MY PANTS @ 7PM) & HUDOST (KIRTAN CONCERT @ 8PM)

 

 Commuter Package (for those traveling from NYC, Boston or beyond!) Weekend stay to include overnight accommodations, organic meals, infrared sauna. Email Imani@themamalution.com for details.
item.name: High Vibe Tribe Re-union
